description:
Hifumi Inokai looks weird. The way she speaks and behaves has changed into that of ordinary pretty girl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoiro Toiki!? Hifumi-chan Mau! Utakata no Ichinichi... Desu
Peach-colored Sigh!? Dance, Hifumi! An Ephemeral Day
桃色吐息!? ヒフミちゃん舞う! うたかたの一日... です~
